Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Bay City in 1979...
Earned first career win on 9/12/1984...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Had first career hit on 7/9/1986, off James Willman (TOL)...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/16/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $891,000 per year...
